haveDrafts.name: zero
haveDrafts.goal:
a b : Nat
h : a * b ≠ 0
⊢ a ≤ a * b

haveDrafts.name: succ
haveDrafts.goal:
a b : Nat
h : a * b ≠ 0
zero : a * 0 ≠ 0 → a ≤ a * 0
⊢ a ≤ a * b

haveDrafts.name: simp
haveDrafts.goal:
a : Nat
h : a * 0 ≠ 0
⊢ a ≤ a * 0

haveDrafts.name: simp
haveDrafts.goal:
a n : Nat
h_1 : a * n ≠ 0 → a ≤ a * n
h : a * (n + 1) ≠ 0
⊢ (fun t ↦ a.le (t.add a)) Nat.zero

haveDrafts.name: simp
haveDrafts.goal:
a n✝ : Nat
h_1 : a * n✝ ≠ 0 → a ≤ a * n✝
h : a * (n✝ + 1) ≠ 0
n : Nat
n_ih : (fun t ↦ a.le (t.add a)) n
⊢ (fun t ↦ a.le (t.add a)) n.succ
